place.name: WEEKLEY
place.gazetteerText: WEEKLEY, a parish in Kettering district, Northampton; 2½ miles NE of Kettering r. station. Post town, Kettering. Acres, 1,800. Real property, £2,196. Pop., 268. Houses, 52. The manor, with Boughton House, belongs to the Duke of Buccleuch. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Peterborough. Value, £126.* Patron, the Duke of Buccleuch. The church is early English. There are an endowed school with £20 a year, and an alms house-hospital with £120. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
